participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious, optimistic, and creative. Loves to express himself through fashion and art.
participant_1.background: I am on a low carb diet. I am trying to become a male model in Hollywood. I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell. I am a huge fan of classical jazz. I overcame urinary cancer at age 18.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Friendly, outgoing, and passionate about music and sports. Enjoys meeting new people and creating lasting memories.
participant_2.background: I graduated with a business degree, and marketing is all that I really enjoyed. I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts. Unfortunately, my family lives across the country from me. I am a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.

content.text: Hi, I'm a male model.
Hi, I'm a marketing graduate.
Cool, what kind of marketing are you interested in?
I'm interested in anything that has to do with social media.
That's cool. I've been trying to get into social media marketing myself, but I'm not very good at it.
I'm sure you'll get the hang of it. Just keep practicing.
I hope so. I'm not sure how I'm going to make it in Hollywood without social media.
You'll figure it out. You seem like a smart guy.
Thanks. I appreciate it.
So, what's your favorite genre of music?
I love classical jazz.
I've never really listened to classical jazz. What's it like?
It's really relaxing and beautiful. It's perfect for listening to while you're working.
I'll have to check it out.
You should. I think you'll like it.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the gym, play video games, and watch movies.
Me too! I love going to the gym and playing video games.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into Call of Duty right now.
Me too! I love Call of Duty.
What's your favorite mode?
I like to play the multiplayer mode.
Me too. It's so much fun to compete against other players.
I know, right? It's so much adrenaline.
